XmlPersoInterface Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for XmlPersoInterface:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class used with xml perso.

To speed-up the file access, the perso is saved in several files in the persos directory (where xxxxxxxx is the perso Id): persoxxxxxxxx.attrb.xml
